glsa.title: Evince: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Evince, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service.

background.p: Evince is a document viewer for multiple document formats, including PostScript.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Evince. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to load a DVI file with a specially crafted font, resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application or a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Evince users should upgrade to the latest version:
NOTE: This is a legacy GLSA. Updates for all affected architectures are available since April 26, 2011. It is likely that your system is already no longer affected by this issue.
